Class Connection.ConnectionNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.hhrt.moodlightreferenceapp.Connection.ConnectionNotification
  • Enclosing class:

    private class Connection.ConnectionNotification
extends java.lang.Object
    Notifications for the connection status.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionNotification(android.app.Activity activity, int notification)
      Issues a new connection notification or cancels an existing one.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionNotification

        ConnectionNotification(android.app.Activity activity,
                       int notification)
        Issues a new connection notification or cancels an existing one.
        Parameters:
        activity - from which the notification is issued
        notification - defines which icon and text is issued;
        See Also:
        CANCEL removes an existing notification
